author: timbeiko
content: I just opened https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8334 to move the Dencun Meta EIP to final, as well as a bunch of PRs to all the fork's EIPs to update their status. Authors need to approve these, so if you authored a Dencun EIP, please take a look ðŸ˜„ ! Will call out the un-merged PR blockooors on ACDC Thursday!

author: ethdreamer
content:
Hello ACD! We're hosting TWO calls to discuss MaxEB in Electra this week since a lot of people couldn't make the first call. We encourage devs who can make it to join one or both of these calls.

The first call takes place tomorrow <t:1710946800>:
zoom link:
https://zoom.us/j/91285778765?pwd=RFdObnpLWlhmQklmSFhvdVBxSGwwdz09
